title: I want a nice simple .NET Framework class that creates a video of what is on the screen
body: Suppose Windows is misbehaving.  Suppose the best way to demonstrate the misbehavior is to create an MP4 file (a video).  Suppose I want this to happen under program control.  My program.  Not Microsoft's program.  Suppose I want it to be absolutely certain the video has not been monkeyed with.
